item.title: Damn-Vulnerable-RESTaurant-API-Game
item.description: Damn Vulnerable Restaurant is an intentionally vulnerable Web API game for learning and training purposes dedicated to developers, ethical hackers and security engineers covering most critical categories of OWASP TOP 10 for API.
